net.jforum.dao

Interface PrivateMessageDAO

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GenericPrivateMessageDAO, OraclePrivateMessageDAO, SqlServerPrivateMessageDAO

    public interface PrivateMessageDAO
    Author:
    Rafael Steil

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void delete(PrivateMessage[] pm, int userId)
      Deletes a collection of private messages.
      PrivateMessage selectById(PrivateMessage pm)
      Gets a PrivateMessage by its id.
      List selectFromInbox(User user)
      Selects all messages from the user's inbox.
      List selectFromSent(User user)
      Selects all messages from the user's sent box.

      Send a new PrivateMessage
      void updateType(PrivateMessage pm)
      Update the type of some private message.

    • Method Detail

      • send

        void send(PrivateMessage pm)
        Send a new PrivateMessage
        Parameters:
        pm - The pm to add

      • delete

        void delete(PrivateMessage[] pm,
          int userId)
        Deletes a collection of private messages. Each instance should at least have the private message id and the owner user id.
        Parameters:
        pm - PrivateMessage[]
        userId -

      • updateType

        void updateType(PrivateMessage pm)
        Update the type of some private message. You should pass as argument a PrivateMessage instance with the pm's id and the new message status. There is no need to fill the other members.
        Parameters:
        pm - The instance to update

      • selectFromInbox

        List selectFromInbox(User user)
        Selects all messages from the user's inbox.
        Parameters:
        user - The user to fetch the messages
        Returns:
        A List with all messages found. Each entry is a PrivateMessage entry.

      • selectFromSent

        List selectFromSent(User user)
        Selects all messages from the user's sent box.
        Parameters:
        user - The user to fetch the messages
        Returns:
        A List with all messages found. Each entry is a PrivateMessage entry.

      • selectById

        PrivateMessage selectById(PrivateMessage pm)
        Gets a PrivateMessage by its id.
        Parameters:
        pm - A PrivateMessage instance containing the pm's id to retrieve
        Returns:
        The pm contents
